rationale: The Da Vinci DEQM IG focuses on exchanging clinical quality measure data between providers and payers/registries for quality reporting and value-based care, primarily within the US healthcare context using FHIR R4. This aligns it with the Administrative & Financial domain (due to its focus on quality reporting and value-based care, which have financial implications) and the US Realm. It also strongly emphasizes data exchange and workflow support.
